original_text: Joseph replied, ‘I am looking for my brothers. They have taken the sheep to eat grass. Please tell me where they are.’
korean_text: 그가 이르되 내가 내 형들을 찾으오니 청하건대 그들이 양치는 곳을 내게 가르쳐 주소서

sentences.original_text: I am looking for my brothers
They have taken the sheep to eat grass
Please tell me where they are
